word_mean: 缝，骨缝：纤维性关节的类型之一，其对合面紧密结合，如颅骨之间的联合
缝线：以缝合法使外科切口或创伤伤口对合所用的材料
缝，缝术：一针缝合或一连串缝针使外科切口或创伤伤口边缘保持对合
缝合：将伤口缝合的动作或过程

sentence.Network_en: Intestinal suture is part of the story of abdominal surgery.
sentence.Network_cn: 肠管缝合是腹部外科过程的一部分.

sentence.Network_en: There is little available musculature to suture anterior to the sternum.
sentence.Network_cn: 在胸骨前只有很少可用的肌肉能够缝合.

sentence.Network_en: The Ascaris adults may perforate a suture line or cause a bile or pancreatic duct obstruction.
sentence.Network_cn: 成虫可穿破缝线或引起胆管或胰腺管阻塞.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 缝合(Suture) 缝合的目的是使创缘相对合，消灭死腔，促进早期愈合。皮肤缝合应避免创缘内翻。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from French, or from Latin sutura, from suere 'sew'

entry.tran: (尤指手术后伤口的)缝线，缝合
entry.def: A suture is a stitch made to join together the open parts of a wound, especially one made after a patient has been operated on.

means.word_mean: 1. an immovable joint (especially between the bones of the skull)
3. thread of catgut or silk or wire used by surgeons to stitch tissues together
